# Node.js dependencies
node_modules/

# Build directories for .NET projects
bin/
obj/

# Static files output directory
wwwroot/

# Logs
*.log
logs/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Coverage directories
coverage/

.vs/
.idea/
